name: He Just Wants To Play
description:
Story

You play as Charles. A young adult who loves visiting lost places

One day when he and his friend David wanted to visit an abandoned house, something happened, that changed his life forever.

Sneak trough the basement and try to avoid the gruesome killer who haunts the place.

Find tools and try to find the 5 computers to open the exit and escape!

And remember, always know where you can hide when he comes

Controls

W, A, S, D : Move   

Shift : Sprint

C / Ctrl : Crouch         

1, 2, 3 : Switch inventory slots   

Q : Drop   

Left-click : Interact / Pickup     

Inspired

Inspired by Nun Massacre (from PuppetCombo), Granny (from dvloper) and Aka Manto (from Chilla's art)

*This game is pretty hard. There are no checkpoints and if you die, you have to start over 

*This game has 3 endings

You can also follow me on Twitter and Youtube!
